name: Custom GPTs
journalism_relevance: Useful for editors and investigative teams who need consistent analytical support over time, such as archive interrogation, policy comparison, style consistency checks, or structured document analysis.

time_dividend.time_saved: Removes the need to repeatedly re-prompt, re-explain context, or restate editorial constraints.
time_dividend.reinvestment: Focused verification, interpretation, and editorial decision-making rather than repetitive setup work.

comments: Runs entirely within the OpenAI platform. Must be paired with strict internal rules governing what documents, notes, or unpublished material may be uploaded.
